This movie is in public domain category and it is Copyright free.

sources.title: The Man With The Golden Arm (1955) Frank Sinatra, Kim Novak - Film Noir Full Movies
sources.description: The Man with the Golden Arm is a 1955 American drama film with elements of film noir, based on the novel of the same name by Nelson Algren. The film stars Frank Sinatra, Eleanor Parker, Kim Novak, Arnold Stang and Darren McGavin. It was adapted for the screen by Walter Newman, Lewis Meltzer and Ben Hecht (uncredited), and directed by Otto Preminger. Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Man_with_the_Golden_Arm Suggested Film Noirs: http://bit.ly/2tLevkl The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. Download complete online British & American classic black & white films from the 1940s & 1950s.

metadata.Plot: Frankie Machine is a skilled card dealer and one-time heroin addict. When he returns home from jail, he struggles to find a new livelihood and to avoid slipping back into addiction.
metadata.Writer: Walter Newman, Lewis Meltzer, Nelson Algren
metadata.Actors: Frank Sinatra, Kim Novak, Eleanor Parker
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. 3 wins & 8 nominations total
